hints.content:
We can think of $\purpleC{9}$ as $\purpleC{9 \text{ ones}}$.  

We can think of $\blueD{38}$ as $\blueD{3\text{ tens}}$ and $\blueD{8\text{ ones}}$.

$\phantom{=}\purpleC{9}+\blueD{38}$

$=\purpleC{9\text{ ones}}+\blueD{3\text{ tens}}+\blueD{8\text{ ones}}$

$= \blueD{3\text{ tens}}+\blueD{8\text{ ones}}+\purpleC{9\text{ ones}}$

question.content:
**Which of the following is equal to $9+38$ ?**
